                    Intellectual Property Protection & Software Ownership
                    -----------------------------------------------------
                    Copyright Protection of Qiskit-Connector Software
                              Dr. Jeffrey Chijioke-Uche

     This package (qiskit-connector) is an intellectual property protected under applicable United States and 
     International intellectual property laws, including but not limited to copyright, software protection, and 
     digital content regulations. While the software is freely distributed and made publicly accessible for use and 
     integration by the global community, it remains the proprietary work of the creator(author) and producer - Dr. Jeffrey Chijioke-Uche.
     
                                      [Right to Use]
                        The qiskit-connector software(pkg) is available for download 
          and use under its published terms for open-license on PyPI at the following link
                           https://pypi.org/project/qiskit-connector
   
                                 [Command to Install Software]
                                 pip install qiskit-connector

              [To cite the software in academic publication, use this APA or any style]
Chijioke-Uche, J. (2025). Quantum Computing Qiskit Connector (2.2.1). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.15349641
